summary: I feel like we shouldn’t know the title of Avengers 4. Even if they show a trailer within the next couple months before Captain...
body:
I feel like we shouldn’t know the title of Avengers 4. Even if they show a trailer within the next couple months before Captain Marvel, It shouldn’t say the title.

Imagine, it’s the end credits of Captain Marvel. The last after credit scene ends, the screen goes black, and we see:

“Captain Marvel will return in AVENGERS:”

*short delay*

“[Insert A4 Title]”

I feel like it would be worth it.

summary:
Под железом всего лишь человек.
Он не железный, не суперсолдат, не человек со сверхспособностями, не человек со зверем внутри,...
body:
Под железом всего лишь человек.

Он не железный, не суперсолдат, не человек со сверхспособностями, не человек со зверем внутри, не бог и не агент. Он всего лишь механик-гений, на плечи которого легла ответственность за весь мир.

Он просто Тони

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

summary: Slaves Don’t
title: Slaves Don’t
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2A7hy6J

by SparkCatcher

Thor banishes Loki to Jotenheim. After years of torture The Jotun King decided to place a slavery spell on Loki. He is to be bound to the person that hates him the most. Everyone, including Loki himself, expects the spell to bind him as a slave forever more to Thor. Ironic justice, bound as a slave to the very person who sent him away.

But what if Thor is not the person who hates Loki the most?

Or

Loki is bound to Tony as his slave. Tony is violent and unpredictable. He hurts Loki and punishes him for the events in New York. He blames him for the death of thousands of people. He blames him for the chaos and destruction he brought to earth. And he takes his anger out on Loki tenfold.

However all is not as it seems. Someone has been pulling the strings in Loki’s life.

Words: 1137, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies), The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, Rape/Non-Con
  • Characters: Loki (Marvel), Tony Stark, Thor (Marvel), Pepper Potts, Peter Parker
  • Relationships: Loki & Tony Stark, Loki/Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Slave Loki (Marvel), Master/Slave, Torture, Eventual Loki/Tony Stark, Angry Tony Stark, Angry Thor (Marvel), Tony Stark Has Issues, Slavery, Hurt Tony Stark, Tony Stark Has A Heart, Beating, Slow Burn, loki is very sad, and depressed, Tony is very angry, and a little dark at first, hopefull things will get better


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2A7hy6J

summary: In Dreams of Delirium
title: In Dreams of Delirium
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2EeOsqc

by JabberWockyWednesday

A meeting is had over destruction, a dream is envisioned in time. It’s a warning depicting the systematic suicide of a banished demigod. This is a love story between two that cannot be together. A story of two cities, a body’s addiction to beauty, the lashes of lost touches, and what some say was the start of the God of Mischiefs true hatred for everyone and everything of “order.”

Words: 16095, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Thor (Movies)
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/M

summary: Steve: You’re right, I have no excuses, I was totally over the line. Tony: Over the line? You’re so far pass the line that you...
body:
Steve: You’re right, I have no excuses, I was totally over the line.

Tony: Over the line? You’re so far pass the line that you can’t even see the line. The line is a dot to you!

by tonystarkssnipples

A collection of (potentially) abandoned works that I love too much to go unpublished but my writer’s block is keeping me from writing them right now.

If any particularly spark your interest, please comment and let me know! Knowing someone is reading and enjoying might help jump start my creative process!

blog.name: yetanothercomicbook
blog.title: Comics
blog.description: Most of the comics I read are Marvels from 1984. Every time I read a comic, I post a comment. That's pretty much it.

summary: When Strikes Diablo
title: When Strikes Diablo
body:
Iron Man #159

Good fun.

  • Villain Attacks Hero? Nope. Instead we get a story-driven adventure. A villain with amnesia is working at Stark International. And, eventually, he remembers who he is.
  • Best Part: The battle at the end is cool, with Iron Man surrounded by his own empty suits.
  • Worst Part: The details on how/why the villain ended up at Stark are fuzzy/vague.
  • Worth Re-Reading? Sure. This is a fun read.

6/10

reblog.comment:

summary: Inktober day 12 “bloom” I realise now that there isn’t anything blooming but a smile in this drawing but Tony turned out looking...
caption:
Inktober day 12 “bloom”

I realise now that there isn’t anything blooming but a smile in this drawing but Tony turned out looking so peaceful that I didn’t wanna scrap this idea and start over. :)

blog.name: why-i-love-comics
blog.title: A blog dedicated to all your favorite moments
blog.description: Batman, Say it fast. Really fast. As fast as you can. Over and over. So what do you hear? Badman. Bad. Man. Batman. Badman. To me... Now and forever... one and                                             the same. - Peter J. Tomasi                                                                         all spoiler posts are tagged "wednesday spoilers"                                             add me on snapchapt! taskrnaster (with an RN instead of M)

blog.name: doctorwholocked2

blog.description: If Sherlock Holmes asked me to be his blogger, then we would solve crimes across the universe in the TARDIS, when Albion's need was greatest.

tags: idk what to tag at this point but someone please tell me I’m wrong.
summary: New suit?
body:
New suit?

So I saw the new set pics and the new red and black suit. And I was. Hype. As. FUCK. Because surely this means Tony lives long enough to reunite with Peter and give his Spiderson a new suit right???? RIGHT??? AND THEN. the feels hit me right in the fuckin gut because what if the black in place of the blue is him mourning for Iron Man???? What if To y dies before the reunion and he wears black to mourn his pseudo father figure. 😭😭😭😭 don’t talk to me. I’m not alright.

reblog.comment:
